set.description: The ID of the power to add the target entity into.
set.markdownDescription: The ID of the power to add the target entity into.

time_limit.description: If specified, this will determine how long the target entity will be stored in the specified power in ticks.
time_limit.markdownDescription: If specified, this will determine how long the target entity will be stored in the specified power in ticks.

type.description:
## Add to Set --- [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/add_to_set) Add the target entity to the power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/add_to_set) of the actor entity. Type ID: `origins:add_to_set` --- ### Examples ```json "bientity_action": { "type": "origins:add_to_set", "set": "example:entities_to_exclude" } ``` This example will add the target entity to the `example:entities_to_exclude` (`data/example/powers/entities_to_exclude.json`) power permanently.
```json "bientity_action": { "type": "origins:add_to_set", "set": "example:make_em_glow", "time_limit": 200 } ``` This example will add the target entity to the `example:make_em_glow` (`data/example/powers/make_em_glow.json`) power temporarily for 10 seconds, after which the target entity will be removed.
type.markdownDescription:
## Add to Set --- [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/add_to_set) Add the target entity to the power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/add_to_set) of the actor entity. Type ID: `origins:add_to_set` --- ### Examples ```json "bientity_action": { "type": "origins:add_to_set", "set": "example:entities_to_exclude" } ``` This example will add the target entity to the `example:entities_to_exclude` (`data/example/powers/entities_to_exclude.json`) power permanently.
```json "bientity_action": { "type": "origins:add_to_set", "set": "example:make_em_glow", "time_limit": 200 } ``` This example will add the target entity to the `example:make_em_glow` (`data/example/powers/make_em_glow.json`) power temporarily for 10 seconds, after which the target entity will be removed.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Add to Set (Bi-entity Action Type) date: 2023-12-14

Add to Set

Bi-entity Action Type

Add the target entity to the power that uses the Entity Set (Power Type) of the actor entity.

Type ID: origins:add_to_set

Fields

Field Type Default Description
set Identifier The ID of the power to add the target entity into.
time_limit Integer optional If specified, this will determine how long the target entity will be stored in the specified power in ticks.

Examples

"bientity_action": {
	"type": "origins:add_to_set",
	"set": "example:entities_to_exclude"
}

This example will add the target entity to the example:entities_to_exclude (data/example/powers/entities_to_exclude.json) power permanently. 

"bientity_action": {
	"type": "origins:add_to_set",
	"set": "example:make_em_glow",
	"time_limit": 200
}

This example will add the target entity to the example:make_em_glow (data/example/powers/make_em_glow.json) power temporarily for 10 seconds, after which the target entity will be removed.
